participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and detail-oriented, Emily is passionate about her work and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life. I have been married for five years. I have been in the wedding planning business for four years now. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures in life and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I don't like sports, but I like to watch my brother play. My favorite singer is Britney Spears. My horse never talks back to me. I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work. I like to smell my own farts.

content.text: Hello
Hi there!
How are you today?
Doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing okay. I'm a wedding planner and I've been in the business for about 4 years now.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job!
It is! I love helping couples plan their special day.
Do you have a favorite memory from your job?
I have a few, but one of my favorites was when I helped a couple plan their destination wedding in Hawaii.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Hawaii.
It was a beautiful wedding and the couple had a great time.
I'm sure they did! That's great.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and bake. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That's great! I like to cook and bake too.
Awesome! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to make homemade pasta.
That sounds delicious! I've always wanted to learn how to make homemade pasta.
It's not too difficult. You can find a lot of great recipes online.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem
